replies.body:
can anyone tell me what early sale means
{{champion:89}}
Sorry for the late response! But I think it's referring to skins that were released only recently, and therefore they're putting an "early sale" on it :3
i really want project Zed :)
{{champion:83}} needs a new skin
Oh. All i want is that vel koz skin WAAA!{{champion:161}} {{item:3070}}
y cant u put project yas on for sale {{item:3070}}
he will be on sale this month :)
its gonna be on sale this month. so keep an eye out for that :)
STOP FKIN DOING THIS ITS A TOTAL SCAM I SEE IT ON EVERY NEWS PAGE IT'S SO ANNOYING PLEASE STOP YOU'RE NOT FOOLING ANYONE!

i dont get it how the hell is this a scam xD they are letting people that want skins know what are the on sale this month. did you have to pay for the game? NO! so get over the fact that they post things on THEIR! website if you dont want skins then dont look it up or click the link

there was a link that someone else posted, probably to a video that shows how to get "free riot points" or something like that, which is, quite obviously, a scam. he wasn't talking about this particular article, but rather, a comment on said article.
Why isn't Academy Ahri on sale like the other Academy skins?
Academy Ahri is actually on sale right now :]
academy{{champion:122}}  also not on sale
PROJECT FIFI!!!!! GIMME RP PLS
When is the PROJECT: Leona skin coming on? I have looked for it everyday...
Soon(TM) [I hope....]
Heartseeker {{champion:22}} Pleaseeeeeeeeeee
A
Guys when do the early sales happen have i missed it some one explain please
what does early sale mean??!?!?!?

Dear Riot
Why the only Project skins that are going on early sale is leona and fiora, what happened to zed and lucian? Quesion.

i just need 77 rp and i can get cottontail fizz
D:
{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
Someone tell me how this got down-voted so much lmao
because its over used
when are the early sales coming on sale kappa?

on this post it says that night hunter rengar will be on sale for 487 Rp sometime in feb. on another post (http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/summer-sale-approaches) it says that night hunter rengar will be on sale on the 25/1 for 682 Rp, does this mean that it will be on sale twice?
That's correct. The January sale is part of Ocean Week, whereas the sale in February is part of the regular global sales schedule.
what about headhunter????
cool thanks
headhunter rengar sale? it hasnt been on sale for a while  {{item:3073}}  {{item:3073}}  {{item:3073}}  {{item:3073}}  {{item:3073}}  {{champion:107}}
Self gifting mystery skins comin back anytime soon?{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
{{champion:201}}
I can see many tears.. Are people trying to save mana?
when do the early sales go up?
can you guys put soulstealer vladmir {{champion:8}}
he was already up for sale a few months ago you missed out.
I wish you guys would put out Arctic Ops Kenen  <3  I've been waiting for ages. D: {{champion:85}}
